categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic regiments

nodes.text: The 7th Aleena Reconnaissance Regiment was a military unit that served by the side of the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Under a small battle group led by Commander Faie, the regiment of Aleena fought alongside the local Wookiee militia at the Kashyyyk capital of Kachirho during the initial Galactic Republic defense there in 19 BBY, providing airborne light cavalry for the battalion of swamp trooper scouts from the 501st Legion and a troop of clone commandos amidst a Separatist Droid Army assault.
